name: Biceps Curls With Barbell
how_to_perform:
1. Hold a barbell with your hands shoulder-width apart and palms facing forward.

2. Keep your back straight, core engaged, and body upright while performing this exercise.

3. Curl the barbell up towards your shoulders by bending at the elbows.

4. Focus on squeezing your biceps muscles as you curl the weight upwards.

5. Lower the barbell back to the starting position in a slow and controlled manner, keeping your elbows close to your body throughout the movement.

6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Biceps curls with barbell is an upper body exercise that targets the bicep muscles, performed by curling a barbell up towards shoulder level.
